title: Serissa's Song
description: When Serissa returns home with Gabe after the tour everything is in perpetual change. Her mother begins to date again. Amber is struggling with the loss of Rose as a friend. Dayton and Colby present her with the shortened timeline she’s been given for her mission and answers to why she has to continue forward. She knows she has to record her album, but it’s difficult to focus on that when her best friend is on a downward spiral and her boyfriend’s future uncertain. When Kyle reappears with another murder fresh on his hands she is no longer willing to be forgiving. Without the time she need on her side, she’ll commit a dose of her own magic in plain sight knowing her unconditional love will be the first of her messages, making her a musical force to be reckoned with. There comes a time in life you have to let go of who you thought you were and become what you know you can be.
author: M. Cundy
